text: Wrightsville is the name of some places in the United States: *Wrightsville, Arkansas *Wrightsville, Georgia *Wrightsville, Missouri *Wrightsville, Adams County, Ohio *Wrightsville, Madison County, Ohio *Wrightsville, Pennsylvania *Wrightsville, Wisconsin, a ghost town *Wrightsville Beach, North Carolina * Wrightsville, a recurring fictional New England small town in the novels of Ellery Queen
title: Wrightsville
